sql.if: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.update: UPDATE news SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, upload_path=#{uploadPath}, file_loca=#{fileLoca}, file_name=#{fileName}, reg_date=sysdate WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from news where bno = (select bno_prev from (SELECT bno, LAG(bno, 1, 9999) OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS bno_prev FROM news) where bno = #{bno})
select * from news where bno = (select bno_next from (SELECT bno, LEAD(bno, 1, 9999) OVER(ORDER BY bno DESC) AS bno_next FROM news) where bno = #{bno})
